verses.text: \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*; put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, O \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* thy \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: for henceforth there shall no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into thee the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* and the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w Shake|strong="H5287"\w* thyself from the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*; \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and\add* sit \w down|strong="H3427"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w loose|strong="H6605"\w* thyself from the \w bands|strong="H4147"\w* of thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, O \w captive|strong="H7628"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Ye have \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* yourselves for \w nought|strong="H2600"\w*; and ye shall be \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* without \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, My \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w aforetime|strong="H7223"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* there; and the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* them without \w cause|strong="H0657"\w*.

Now therefore, what have I here, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H3947"\w* for \w nought|strong="H2600"\w*? they that \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over them make them to \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w blasphemed|strong="H5006"\w*.

Therefore my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: therefore \add they shall know\add* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I \add am\add* he that doth \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: behold, \add it is\add* I.

¶ How \w beautiful|strong="H4998"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* are the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of him that bringeth good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, that \w publisheth|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; that bringeth good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w* of \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, that \w publisheth|strong="H8085"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; that \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, Thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*!

Thy \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* shall lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; with the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* shall they \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*: for they shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* to \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

¶ Break forth into \w joy|strong="H6476"\w*, \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, ye waste \w places|strong="H2723"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he hath \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath made \w bare|strong="H2834"\w* his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; and all the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ \w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* ye, \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* ye, go ye \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from thence, \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* no \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add thing;\add* go ye \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her; be ye \w clean|strong="H1305"\w*, that \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For ye shall not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with \w haste|strong="H2649"\w*, nor \w go|strong="H3212"\w* by \w flight|strong="H4499"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you; and the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add will be\add* your \w rereward|strong="H0622"\w*.\f + \fr 52.12 \ft be…: Heb. gather you up\f*

¶ Behold, my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* shall deal \w prudently|strong="H7919"\w*, he shall be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* and \w extolled|strong="H5375"\w*, and be \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w high|strong="H1361"\w*.\f + \fr 52.13 \ft deal…: or, prosper\f*

As \w many|strong="H7227"\w* were \w astonied|strong="H8074"\w* at thee; his \w visage|strong="H4758"\w* was so \w marred|strong="H4893"\w* more than any \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and his \w form|strong="H8389"\w* more than the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*:

So shall he \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H7092"\w* their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* at him: for \add that\add* which had not been \w told|strong="H5608"\w* them shall they \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; and \add that\add* which they had not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* shall they \w consider|strong="H0995"\w*.
